dmxP512

Class DmxP512

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • dmxP512.DmxP512
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DmxP512
extends java.lang.Thread
    author Henri DAVID
    dmxP512 : DMX processing.org library
    class for DMX output.
    • project info : motscousus.com/stuff/2011-01_dmxP512/
    • handles DMX USB Pro Enttec and LANBOX devices.

      • DmxP512

        public DmxP512(processing.core.PApplet papplet,
       int universeSize,
       boolean buffered)
        Creates the dmxP512 object. the interface(s) used must still be setup using the correct method.
        Parameters:
        papplet - : daddy
        universeSize - : size of the DMX universe (number of channels)
        buffered - : use a buffer before sending. if false frames are sent directly.

    • Method Detail

      • setupDmxPro

        public void setupDmxPro(java.lang.String dmxProSerialPortName)
        set up the DMX output for use with DMX USB Pro Enttenc interface.
        Parameters:
        dmxProSerialPortName - : port name com1 or "/dev/stxx" on unix, "/dev/tty.usbserial-ENQ9C839" on mac, "COM4" on windows. keep in mind that case in important (COM4 and not com4). if you see null pointer exceptions during sending of serial messages, mostlikely you entered the serial port name wrong.

      • setupDmxPro

        public void setupDmxPro(java.lang.String dmxProSerialPortName,
               int dmxProBaudRate)
        set up the dmx output for use with DMX USB Pro Enttenc interface
        Parameters:
        dmxProSerialPortName - : port name com1 or "/dev/stxx" on unix, "/dev/tty.usbserial-ENQ9C839" on mac, "COM4" on windows. keep in mind that case in important (COM4 and not com4). if you see null pointer exceptions during sending of serial messages, mostlikely you entered the serial port name wrong.
        dmxProBaudRate - : serial port speed

      • setupLanbox

        public void setupLanbox(java.lang.String lanboxIP)
        Set up the DMX output for use with Lanbox device.
        Parameters:
        lanboxIP - : IP of the lanbox device. i could not find how to change the lanbox ip, the on i received was set on 192.168.1.77.

      • setupLanbox

        public void setupLanbox(java.lang.String lanboxIP,
               int lanboxPort)
        Set up the DMX output for use with Lanbox device.
        Parameters:
        lanboxIP - : IP of the lanbox device. i could not find how to change the lanbox ip, the on i received was set on 192.168.1.77.
        lanboxPort - : udp port number, in case it is not matching the default port number.

      • set

        public void set(int channel,
       int[] values)

        Parameters:
        channel - : first channel
        values -
